body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Customer Support at FunZone Arcades. My name is Gary Ward. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gary, my name is Diana Gonzalez. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. Could you please provide me with your email address and order number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is diana.gonzalez@example.com and the order number is one zero zero two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. That's all I need for now. Do you have any other questions or concerns regarding your Arcade purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I was wondering when I can expect my Arcade to be delivered and if there are any assembly instructions included?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can check the shipping status for you, Diana. The estimated delivery time for your Arcade is seven to ten business days. Assembly instructions should be included in the package. Is there anything else you would like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, thank you. I'm looking forward to receiving my Arcade.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diana. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!
